Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Laboratory: Technical Research On The Monster Rancher CD Read Process: Subcode Data Files: Monster Rancher 2 Subcode: Requests For CDs To Be Posted As Subcode: The rest of the ??? monsters please
By Farmer Jimbo on Friday, April 27, 2001 - 06:08 pm:

This is a blanket request for the rest of the ??? monsters. If you have a "rare" cd and a cd-rom player, please post the sub-code. Check the list first of course to see if it's already been posted. I'll be burning all the rares to triple check the posted sub-code.

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, August 30, 2001 - 11:52 am:

And to repeat for the benefit of all newbies: if a /??? isn't posted, it's because none of us own the CD. Asking us to post it won't do any good. The reason why none of us own these CDs is generally because we have wasted a lot of money on the wrong pressings and have yet to find the correct pressing. (And many of the /??? posted here were only gotten after many, many tries.) I personally own 6-8 bad copies of the CDs that supposedly make the remaining /??? types, plus many copies of bad pressing of CDs where I was finally successful. Many of these posts have cost over a hundred dollars to track down.

This request is asking you to post the CDs, because we don't own them.

Missing monsters:
